description: The Thales Ka Band connectivity system provides the aircraft with satellite internet connectivity and a wireless local area network (LAN). This Engineering Authorization (EA) provides Maintenance with instructions to remove the Thales Ka system from the aircraft listed in this EA's effectivity.
justification: Remove Thales Ka (Gen 1) switches from the P5 overhead panel.
impact:
CAE dwg 368911-020/-021/-035/-036

This EA will remove two switches from the P5 panel 'KA POWER ON/OFF' and 'KA GND TX ENABLE OVERRIDE/NORMAL'.  Along with removing 2 circuit breakers from the P6-1 panel C7-KA CRU(C9208) and C8-KS ASU(C9207). Also 3 circuit breakers from the P6-4 panel WEB/WDU (C9209), KA DC CTRL (C9210), KKA DC BUS (C9211)
parts_json: [{"part":"MS24658-23D","desc":"'KA POWER ON/OFF' and 'KA GND TX ENABLE OVERRIDE/NORMAL'","type":"Remove","qty":"2"},{"part":"BACP20B43B","desc":"Plug","type":"Add","qty":"2"}]
instructions_json:
[{"instruction":"

P5 Panel Demodification Reference Thales drawing 187354, Sheet 5 (Detail E)

  • If not already done, remove power from the simulator
  • Gain access to the flight deck area P5 panel
  • Cover the P5 panel and simulator wiring
  • Cover the P8 and P9 panel

Avoid metal shavings from getting into the aircraft control panels.

  • Remove the two (2) Thales Ka switches, 'KA POWER ON/OFF' and 'KA GND TX ENABLE OVERRIDE/NORMAL' (both P/N: MS24658-23D) from the P5 panel.
  • Install two (2) plugs (P/N: P/N BACP20B43B), one in each hole.
  • Remove placards 'S9618' and 'S9619' from the AFT side of the P5 panel, if existing.
  • Remove placards 'KA SYSTEM CONTROL ON/OFF' and 'KA GND TX ENABLE OVERRIDE/NORMAL' from the front side of the P5 panel. Clean any placard residue from the area per BAC 5750 (or equivalent).
","notes":""},{"instruction":"

P6-1 Load Center Reference CAE dwg 368911-020/-021.

Unwrap daisy-chained wires from (circuit breakers located at):

  • C6-1 to C7-1
  • C7-1 to C8-1
  • C8-1 to C9-1

Add wirewrap wires from (circuit breakers located at):

  • C6-1 to C9-1

Unwrap daisy-chained wires from (circuit breakers located at):

  • B7-2 to C7-2
  • C7-2 to E7-2
  • A1J3-23 to C8-1
  • C8-1 to E8-1

Add wirewrap wires from (circuit breakers located at):

  • B7-2 to E7-2
  • A1J3-23 to E8-1

 

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

P6-1 Panel Demodification Reference Thales dwg 187354, Sheet 5 Detial F.

Remove and discard the following circuit breakers and associated placards (2 circuit breakers, 4 placards) from the P6-1 panel. Clean any placard residue from the area per BAC 5750 (or equivalent).

  • Position C8: KA ASU (C9207) - P/N: PS387054.02
  • Position C7: KA CRU (C9208) - P/N: PS387054.09

Install a dome plug (P/N: BACP20B43B or equivalent) in circuit breaker positions C7 and C8 where circuit breakers C9207 and C9028 were removed.

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

P6-4 Load Center Reference CAE dwg 368911-035/-036. 

Unwrap daisy-chained wires from (circuit breakers located at):

  • B14-1 to B15-1
  • B15-1 to B16-1
  • B16-1 to B17-1

 

  • A1J1-44 to B15-2
  • B15-2 to C15-2
  • A1J1-43 to B16-2
  • B16-2 to D16-2
  • A1J1-42 to B17-2

Add wirewrap wires from (circuit breakers located at):

  • A1J1-44 to C15-2
  • A1J1-43 to D16-2

 

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

P6-4 Panel Demodification Reference Thales dwg 187354, Sheet 5 Detial H.

Remove and discard the following circuit breakers and associated placards (3 circuit breakers, 6 placards) from the P6-4 pane. Clean any placard residue from the area per BAC 5750 (or equivalent).

  • Position B15: KA DC CTRL (C9210) - P/N: PS387054.04
  • Position B16: WEB/WDU (C9209) - P/N: PS387054.04
  • Position B17: KKA DC BUS (C9211) - P/N: PS387054.08

Install a dome plug (P/N: BACP20B43B or equivalent) in circuit breaker positions B15, B16 and B17 where circuit breakers C9209, C9210 and C9211 were removed.

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Ensure the work area is clean and clear of tools and debris.

","notes":""}]
